text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 87 HOMES FOR THE COMMUNITY safety procedures and the maintenance of the accommodation and any communal spaces provided. 12.55 Part 2 seeks to incorporate, where practical, small-scale community and town centre uses within the development proposal. Such components can improve the health and well-being of residents as they offer opportunity to play an active role in their community through continued interaction and stimulation with the surrounding existing and wider community. 12.56 Part 3 sets out that existing accommodation will be protected where it is considered suitable and meeting the needs and standards required.
